resources.string: Use Embiggen to share photos and videos among Android devices and make them embigger!
Embiggen requires a HOST to display shared content, get the Embiggen HOST app and run it on a tablet or Google TV
Once the host is running, as many Embiggen CONTROLLERs as you want can connect and share
Embiggen does *not* send your content to the cloud, all networking is local, host and controllers must be on the same WiFi network
